question.ask: ets_th4 When was the first inventor born?

info.value: Hello! Today’s competition is about inventors. I’ll describe the inventors, and all the four groups here will guess who I’m describing. Each correct answer will earn you 20 points and each wrong answer will cost you 10 points. Remember to put up your hands if you have the answer. When I see your hands up, I’ll ask your group to answer. Now let’s start. The first inventor for you to guess is a man. He was born in 1706 in Boston. In 1752, he flew a kite on a rainy day so as to study lightning. Does any group know the answer?
